bug.short_desc: API viewer "search" does not find internal methods

long_desc.thetext:
Description: When one searches for a method via the "serach" tab, internal methods are not found/searched.
This is independent of the setup at top-right (filters).
Reproduction: Try to find method "tabFocus". There are several methods found, but qx.ui.core.Widget#tabFocus (internal) not.
This might be the preferred behavior, but at least on local builds this is not optimal. If this 'feature' (find-internals) is not to be enabled as default, I would like to see a generator-target or command line switch for that. However i think whith the filter buttons at top-right of the page you have full control over the hide/show behavior.
Move open issues to RESOLVED â€“ LATER, whose last comment is older than a year.
